original_text: Say this to them, Thus says the Lord God: As I live, surely those who are in the waste places shall fall by the sword, and whoever is in the open field I will give to the beasts to be devoured, and those who are in strongholds and in caves shall die by pestilence.
korean_text: 너는 그들에게 이르기를 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시되 내가 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 황무지에 있는 자는 칼에 엎드러뜨리고 들에 있는 자는 들짐승에게 넘겨 먹히게 하고 산성과 굴에 있는 자는 전염병에 죽게 하리라

sentences.original_text: surely those who are in the waste places shall fall by the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 황무지에 있는 자들은 반드시 칼에 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: and whoever is in the open field
I will give to the beasts to be devoured
and those who are in strongholds and in caves
